title: Coleen Rooney breaks cover after 'Instagram gate' as Becky Vardy comes out fighting
text:

Coleen Rooney has been pictured for the first time since she brutally exposed Rebekah's Vardy Instagram account for 'selling stories' about her.

The wife of footballer Wayne - dubbed 'WAGatha Christie' - caused a social media storm on Wednesday after revealing how she turned detective to catch the mole that betrayed her trust.

But a day later, Coleen had to put the furore behind her as she was back on mummy duties running errands with her youngest son Cass.

Coleen, 33, was spotted on a low key shopping trip to Manchester with one-year-old Cass in the pushchair.

(Image: Eamonn and James Clarke)

(Image: Eamonn and James Clarke)

The mum-of-five kept on a stern face as she went about her day, cosily dressed in a bright yellow jumper, form flattering skinny jeans and buckled ankle boots.

Coleen, who said she's been 'burdened' by stories being sold about her to the press over the last few years, wore her brunette locks scraped back and minimal make-up for her outing.

(Image: Eamonn and James Clarke)

(Image: Eamonn and James Clarke)

(Image: Eamonn and James Clarke)

poll loading Was Coleen right to publicly name Vardy as leak? 500+ VOTES SO FAR YES NO

Her understated appearance makes a marked contrast from the social media frenzy she sparked yesterday when she accused her former friend Rebekah Vardy of selling stories about her.

Coleen told her followers how she had planted a series of false stories on her private Instagram page that was only accessible to view by Rebekah Vardy's account.

Vardy immediately denied Coleen's claims and said she felt 'disgusted' that she was forced into doing so.

(Image: Dave J Hogan/Getty Images)

After firing off a defencive statement, where she insisted she 'doesn't exactly need the money', Vardy has since recruited forensic experts to look into exactly who has been accessing her Instagram account to prove her innocence.

In the last 24 hours she has also been publicly shaming trolls and hitting back at her critics.

(Image: Ken McKay/ITV/REX)

(Image: RebekahVardy/Twitter)

Ex WAG Danielle Lloyd had appeared on a discussion about the WAG war on This Morning.

Lloyd, who used to date Jamie O'Hara said she 'wasn't shocked' to see Coleen out Rebekah as the mole.

Rebekah then tweeted: "Danielle Lloyd making false claims on @thismorning that we have had ‘similar run-ins’ is utter b*******. She is just fuming that I 'didn’t get Jamie recruiting' for her like she asked me to..."
description: The WAG turned 'super sleuth' emerged after the drama to run errands with her son after Rebekah Vardy has slammed her accusations
